function.name: cleaning_getProgress
function.description: This function is used to check the cleaning progress of a robot vacuum cleaner.

location.description: The location where the device is located. e.g. home, office, etc.

room.description: The room where the device is located.  e.g. living room, bedroom, bathroom, etc.

device.description: The name or type of the device whose cleaning progress needs to be checked. ### CHECK ###

groupAction.description: A group action associated with the device.
